phones.name: Iphone 11
phones.camera: Dual-camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide and Wide cameras; Night mode, Portrait mode, and 4K video up to 60fps

phones.name: OnePlus 7T Pro
phones.camera: 16MP popup selfie camera; Triple rear camera setup ,primary camers is 48-megapixel,The other two are telephoto and wide lens and are 12 and 16 megapixel respectively
phones.os: Oxygen OS based on Android v10
